entry.def: If you describe a situation or event as farcical, you mean that it is so silly or extreme that you are unable to take it seriously.

example.ex: ...a farcical nine months' jail sentence imposed yesterday on a killer.
example.tran: 昨天判处一个杀人犯 9 个月监禁的荒唐判决
